levels.description: Fires scorching bullets that leave incendiary marks at fixed distances as they travel. The bullets explode upon reaching maximum attack range, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Physical Damage and causing incendiary marks to explode in sequence, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale_2:0%}</> Physical Damage
